word:
2NL - Notebook Leaflets from the Elmshaven Library Vol. 2 (1985)


Chap. 1 - "Preach the Word"

By Ellen G. White

     Much valuable instruction pertaining to the work of the ministry has been published from the pen of Ellen G. White. For the benefit of leading evangelists, however, the following passages relating to the subject matter of their discourses has been compiled from the Manuscript and Letter file. --Trustees of the Ellen G. White Estate.
